name: Snow Home
description:
Snow Home is a story about growth, moving on and holding on.

Snow Home was created as a part of the Global Game Jam 2019, in which the theme was "What home means to you". 

Snow Home is a short story, which aims to make everyone think about not only their home, and what they have left behind, but also what they have still left in front of them. Their dreams, and ambitions.
